pkgmetadata.longdescription: citeproc-el is an Emacs Lisp library for rendering citations and bibliographies in styles described in the Citation Style Language (CSL), an XML-based, open format to describe the formatting of bibliographic references (see http://citationstyles.org/ for further information on CSL). The library implements most of the CSL 1.0.2 specification, including such features as citation disambiguation, cite collapsing and subsequent author substitution, and passes more than 70% of the tests in the CSL Test Suite. In addition to the standard CSL-JSON data format, citeproc-el has rudimentary support for reading bibliographic data from BibTeX, biblatex and org-bibtex bibliographies and can produce output in several formats including HTML and org-mode markup (see Supported output formats for the full list).
